column5: Just got back from this long anticipated spring show It's HUGE!!  Packed and parking is scarce. You can pick from dozens of dock companies.  Lots of builders and suppliers.   Boats.  Seadoos. ATVs. But ya can't buy a Husky Jerk or even a jig ? What gives?
It's a cottage show.. not a fishing show. Out of my immediate 40 neighbours at the lake.. 3 fish!
That's a good thing Wayne, less pressure, Hahaha  I'm not the typical cottager, but there's a common thread and that's the appreciation of the wilder places and getting out of the city.
going tomorrow, disappointed no fishing stuff
I have been passing it going to work at YYZ for the last couple days and I can tell you it's a packed house for sure  . Looks like a complete gong show for parking , get there early !
